scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test-automatic-instrumentation && docker-compose up -d && jest --silent; docker-compose stop
scripts.test-ci: npm run compile && npm run test-automatic-instrumentation && jest --silent --config jest.ci.config.json --coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.release-minor: npm install; npm run build; release-it minor --ci --git.commit --git.push --git.tag --git.tagName='v${version}' --github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-minor-without-tag: npm install; npm run build; release-it minor --ci --no-git.commit --no-git.push --no-git.tag --no-git.tagName='v${version}' --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --no-github.release --npm.publish
scripts.release: npm install; npm run build; release-it --ci --git.commit --git.push --git.tag --git.tagName='v${version}' --github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-without-tag: npm install; npm run build; release-it --ci --no-git.commit --no-git.push --no-git.tag --no-git.tagName='v${version}' --no-github.release --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --npm.publish
scripts.release-dry-run: npm install; npm run build; release-it minor --dry-run --ci --no-git.commit --no-git.push --no-git.tag --no-git.tagName='v${version}' --no-git.requireCleanWorkingDir --no-git.requireUpstream --no-github.release --no-npm.publish
